# About the authors {#authors}

- Rena has a degree in Biology and works for the Missouri Department of Conservation as an Outdoor Educator. She has a love for native plants, bees and ecology. She's an avid cyclist, runner, camper and hiker. She, her husband and their dog Porter live in St. Louis.

- Crystal has a degree not at all related to the outdoors. However, she's been on several backpacking camping trips, countless hikes, and yearly canoe trips with their dog before he passed away. This summer she and her husband took their 2-year-old son on his first camping trip, his first kayak trip, and his first hike over 1 mile.
